Package src.logic

package src.logic
Contains the core game logic and business rules for Battleship.

This package handles:

  • Game state management
  • Ship placement and validation
  • Turn management and game rules
  • Win condition checking
  • save and load handling
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Board
    implements a game Board for battleships this includes, a field that stores the position of the users ships, a field that signifies where the opponent has already shot and a field that signifies where the user has already shot at
    Coordinate
    implements a simple Coordinate class consisting of a x and a y integer
    Game
    the Game class uses a Board object to implement the games logic, controls the turn order of the player and is used to process the communication with the opponent
    Ship
    implements a singular Ship
